Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem at Western. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem at Western.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
